document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing Oresk in the southeast.
document_data.name: Oresk
document_data.mainbody: '''Oresk''' was a small island in the [[Pirate Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: Oresk was found directly southeast of [[Bulta]] in the southeastern region of the isles.
document_data.Description: There were several natural harbors found along the island's coastline.
document_data.Inhabitants: Oresk was one of three pirate strongholds in the Pirate Isles. A young woman named [[Azla]] ruled the pirates here as of [[1359 DR]].
